config.sedparties.tooltip.display: Activate or deactivate the current element.
config.sedparties.tooltip.xpos: The X position of the current element (or icon).
config.sedparties.tooltip.xtpos: The X position of the text in the current element when unattached.
config.sedparties.tooltip.ypos: The Y position of the current element (or icon).
config.sedparties.tooltip.zpos: The Z position of the current element. Elements with higher values render on top of those with lower values.
config.sedparties.tooltip.ytpos: The Y position of the text in the current element when unattached.
config.sedparties.tooltip.scale: The scaling of the element. Options are 50%, 100%, or 200%.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tcolor: The main color of the element's text.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tcabsorb: The health text color when an absorb effect is active.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tcdead: The health text color when the player is dead.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tshadow: Whether or not the element's text should also render a shadow (or outline).
config.sedparties.tooltip.tmax: The text's max length. Names will be cut to this value of they are over the limit.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tattached: Whether the text should be attached to the icon or not.
config.sedparties.tooltip.idisplay: Enable the display of the element's icon or image.
config.sedparties.tooltip.bgdisplay: Enable the background of the element.
config.sedparties.tooltip.tdisplay: Enable the text of the element.
config.sedparties.tooltip.danim: Enable an animation when party members switch dimensions.
config.sedparties.tooltip.rowmax: The maximum number of buffs in one row.
config.sedparties.tooltip.totalmax: The maximum number of buffs displayed total.
config.sedparties.tooltip.buffg: The outline color of a beneficial effect.
config.sedparties.tooltip.buffb: The outline color of a detrimental effect
config.sedparties.tooltip.flash: The outline color of when an effect flashes. Happens when an instant effect is displayed.
config.sedparties.tooltip.blim: The number of good effects displayed when an overflow indicator is active. (Duration prioritization must be off.)
config.sedparties.tooltip.dlim: The number of bad effects displayed when an overflow indicator is active. (Duration prioritization must be off.)
config.sedparties.tooltip.dfirst: Whether or not beneficial effects are displayed
config.sedparties.tooltip.bsep: Whether or not duration is prioritized. If active, debuff prioritization and good/bad buff ratios are disabled.
config.sedparties.tooltip.bsize: The size of the border around the effect icon square. Grows inwards.
config.sedparties.tooltip.gen_w: The party frame's width (for element boundaries).
config.sedparties.tooltip.gen_h: The party frame's height (for element boundaries).
config.sedparties.tooltip.gen_pw: Horizontal spacing between party member frames.
config.sedparties.tooltip.gen_ph: Vertical spacing between party member frames.
config.sedparties.tooltip.genc_w: The width of the clickable area (for targeting and selection)
config.sedparties.tooltip.genc_h: The height of the clickable area (for targeting and selection
config.sedparties.tooltip.genc_x: The x position of the clickable area (which bounded within the frame)
config.sedparties.tooltip.genc_y: The y position of the clickable area (which bounded within the frame)
config.sedparties.tooltip.bhue: The hue of bar's main color (example: health)
config.sedparties.tooltip.ohue: The hue of the bar's overflow color (example: absorption)
config.sedparties.tooltip.mhue: The hue of bar's main color (example: mana)
config.sedparties.tooltip.bcit: The top gradient color of the health increase animation
config.sedparties.tooltip.bcib: The bottom gradient color of the health increase animation
config.sedparties.tooltip.bcdt: The top gradient color of the health decrease animation
config.sedparties.tooltip.bcdb: The bottom gradient color of the health decrease animation
config.sedparties.tooltip.ttype: Text display type. Options are a ratio, current health only, and a percentage.
config.sedparties.tooltip.mtype: Text display type. Options are a ratio, current mana only, and a percentage.
config.sedparties.tooltip.htype: Changes the head display. 0 for icons, 1 for self model only, 2 for party models.
config.sedparties.tooltip.bleed: Whether or not to render bleeding text indicator (for PlayerRevive mod).
messages.sedparties.config.loadfail: Load not successful because preset is of a different version.
messages.sedparties.config.loadfailv: Try loading a file instead or copy a preset of the same version.
messages.sedparties.preset.pastefail: The clipboard doesn't contain a valid preset
messages.sedparties.preset.savefail: There was an issue saving the preset.
messages.sedparties.preset.copy: Preset has been copied to clipboard.
gui.sedparties.tooltip.confirmreset: Are you sure? Click again to confirm.
messages.sedparties.command.kickfail: Only the party leader can kick other players.
messages.sedparties.api.coldsweatunload: Cold Sweat needs to be version 2.2 or higher! Support has been disabled.
messages.sedparties.phandler.declineinvi: You have declined a party invite from %s.
Your party invite has been automatically declined
%s took too long to respond. Invite cancelled.
You took too long to respond to a party request from %s
messages.sedparties.phandler.receivedinv: You can click the following to respond:
messages.sedparties.phandler.sendinvite: You have sent a party invite to %s.
messages.sedparties.phandler.noinviteper: Only the party leader can invite other players
messages.sedparties.phandler.changeleade: You are now the party leader.
messages.sedparties.phandler.kickedfromp: You have been kicked from the party.
%s has been kicked from the party.
